info.description: API to manage Credit Limit related information such as retrieving Limit Utilisation or Outstandings, Limit Cashflow, Overdrawn Limits, Limits Review & Expiry, SubLimit details and manage Limit Sharing Group details of Master and Sub Groups.
info.title: Limits service

get.summary: Retrieves Limit cashflow details of contract
get.description: Retrieves the facility cashflow against the Limit, commitment and drawing schedules utilized

parameters.name: arrangementId
parameters.description: Indicates an unique identifier of an account

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

get.summary: Retrieves Limit details of Customer group
get.description: Retrieves all of the customer group limit exposures such as limit allocations, Outstanding, Product, Expiry along with details of related Customers in the Group, related Sub groups

parameters.name: customerLimitId
parameters.description: The identifier of the customer limits application

parameters.name: riskGroupId
parameters.description: Identifier of the CUSTOMER.GROUP that constitues one or more related customers which would be used while arrivnig collective risk exposure of credit line liable to them either individually or shared among them.

parameters.name: liabilityNumber
parameters.description: Identifier of the Liability Customer to the credit limit

parameters.name: limitId
parameters.description: The identifier of credit limit

parameters.name: creditLineNumber
parameters.description: Details of the top most parent credit line plus the limit product in the hierarchy. Eg : 300/LI1701101987 where 300 is the limit product of the topmost parent and second part is the respective creditline

parameters.name: recordParent
parameters.description: Identifier of the immediate parent limit

parameters.name: limitProduct
parameters.description: Identifier of the credit limit product

parameters.name: serialNumber
parameters.description: A sequence reference for the limit, which when used together with other fields such as Liability Number and/or Limit Reference, provides a unique identifier for a credit line

parameters.name: limitCurrency
parameters.description: Currency in which the credit limit is granted

parameters.name: expiryDate
parameters.description: The date an agreement such as an arrangement, product, credit facility or limit is due to expire

parameters.name: timeBandName
parameters.description: Description of the individual time code under a credit facility

parameters.name: internalAmount
parameters.description: Indicates the amount allocated to the Credit Limit by the Bank

parameters.name: advisedAmount
parameters.description: Indicates the amount advised to the Credit Limit by the bank

parameters.name: outstandingAmount
parameters.description: Identifies the total outstanding amount for the corresponding Liability number and Limit reference.

parameters.name: availableAmount
parameters.description: The credit limit available to the customer for use

parameters.name: availableOrExcess
parameters.description: The available amount for the corresponding liability number and limit reference. This amount is always expressed in the currency of the limit. Calculated as the sum of the online limit, the available balance and any sub allocation taken, less any sub allocation given, any commission available, the total outstanding.

parameters.name: totalCommitment
parameters.description: Specifies the total available commitment amounts  specific to a credit facility

parameters.name: totalCredit
parameters.description: Indicates the total credit balance of the customer's account

parameters.name: totalDebit
parameters.description: Indicates the total debit balance of the customer's account

parameters.name: requestedCurrency
parameters.description: The currency the amount is requested in.

parameters.name: exchangeRate
parameters.description: Contains the exchange rate returned from the system. i.e. For entries over foreign currency accounts, this contains the rate which used to convert the currency amount to the local equivalent at the time of the originating transaction.

parameters.name: idlType
parameters.description: The INTRA.DAY.LIMIT type that is applicable for a specific credit facility of the customer

parameters.name: idlApprovedAmount
parameters.description: The approved amount by the bank as INTRA.DAY.LIMIT on a credit facility within a specific period of the day

parameters.name: idlAdvisedAmount
parameters.description: The advised amount by the bank to the customer as INTRA.DAY.LIMIT on a credit facility within a specific period of the day

parameters.name: limitType
parameters.description: Defines the limit type for the trade

parameters.name: relatedCustomer
parameters.description: Indicates the related customers of multi customer and joint limits

parameters.name: sharedLimit
parameters.description: Indicates whether the credit line is of shared limit structure

parameters.name: adjustAvailableAmount
parameters.description: Indicates to adjust the available funds to respective time bands.

parameters.name: rebuildData
parameters.description: Indicates to rebuild the customer exposure when enquired by user.

parameters.name: aggregateCustomerId
parameters.description: List of customer/person entity that are aggregated under a main customer on risk exposure view

parameters.name: aggregateCustomerRelation
parameters.description: Relation code that exists between the main customer and the aggregated customers

parameters.name: limitNote
parameters.description: Relation code that exists between the main customer and the aggregated customers

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: Id of the T24 session where the risk exposure view executed

parameters.name: subGroup
parameters.description: Identifier of the sub group within a CUSTOMER.GROUP that constitues one or more related customers which would be used while arrivnig collective risk exposure of credit line liable to them either individually or shared among them.

parameters.name: originalInternalAmount
parameters.description: Specifies the orignal amount actually approved or authorised on a credit line by Management or the Credit Committee before any repayment made

parameters.name: originalAdvisedAmount
parameters.description: Specifies the original amount advised to the customer holding the credit facility before any repayment made

parameters.name: repaidAmount
parameters.description: Indicates the amount which was repaid from the customer

parameters.name: totalRepaidAmount
parameters.description: Total of the repaid amount under a credit facility

parameters.name: excessFlag
parameters.description: Flag to indicate the credit line has been over utilised

parameters.name: fixedOrVariable
parameters.description: Indicates the secured nature of limit that has been covered by a customer collateral. When 'FIXED' the limit amount sanctioned will not have impact on changing value of collateral whereas when 'VARIABLE' limit amount will change based on the collateral amount changes.

parameters.name: securedAmount
parameters.description: The total amount that has been covered by the collateral underlying the credit facility

parameters.name: multiCustomerLimit
parameters.description: Specifies if a credit facility shall be used by multiple customers

parameters.name: groupClass
parameters.description: Classify the type of group, whether it is a CUSTOMER.GROUP or SUB.GROUP

parameters.name: isAggregationExists
parameters.description: Indicates if there exists aggregation of one or many customer exposure under a primary customer

parameters.name: mainGroupId
parameters.description: Identifier of the main group under which the sub group has been defined

parameters.name: creditLineProduct
parameters.description: Identifier of the limit product of the topmost credit facility in the hierarchy

parameters.name: gvIndicator
parameters.description: Indicator which specifies the graphical view of risk exposure report requested

parameters.name: onlineLimit
parameters.description: The Limit amount that is actually available for use.The system limit checks are performed against the online limit

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

get.summary: Retrieves relations among customers
get.description: Retrieves all of the customer relation details such as party or customer id, type, name and aggregate customer details under a customer group.

parameters.name: subGroup
parameters.description: Identifier of the sub group within a CUSTOMER.GROUP that constitues one or more related customers which would be used while arrivnig collective risk exposure of credit line liable to them either individually or shared among them.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

arrangementEffectiveDate.description: It is a date on/upon which an account is considered to take effect

limitSchedule.description: Contains the limit schedule amount of the given arrangement  upto the dates specified

consolDrawingsCashflow.description: Contains the consolidated drawings cashflow amount of the given arrangement with all respective drawings.

consolLimitCashflow.description: Contains the consolidated limit cashflow amount of the given facility arrangement upto the dates specified

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message
The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message for bad requests

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business

code.description: The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message caused by server

type.description: The identifier of error type: System

idlType.description: The INTRA.DAY.LIMIT type that is applicable for a specific credit facility of the customer

idlApprovedAmount.description: The approved amount by the bank as INTRA.DAY.LIMIT on a credit facility within a specific period of the day

idlAdvisedAmount.description: The advised amount by the bank to the customer as INTRA.DAY.LIMIT on a credit facility within a specific period of the day

relatedCustomer.description: Indicates the related customers of multi customer and joint limits

aggregateCustomerId.description: List of customer/person entity that are aggregated under a main customer on risk exposure view

aggregateCustomerRelation.description: Relation code that exists between the main customer and the aggregated customers

relatedPartyName.description: Name of the Party related to the Customer

limitNotes.description: Relation code that exists between the main customer and the aggregated customers

limitNote.description: Relation code that exists between the main customer and the aggregated customers

subGroups.description: Identifier of the sub group within a CUSTOMER.GROUP that constitues one or more related customers which would be used while arrivnig collective risk exposure of credit line liable to them either individually or shared among them.

subGroup.description: Identifier of the sub group within a CUSTOMER.GROUP that constitues one or more related customers which would be used while arrivnig collective risk exposure of credit line liable to them either individually or shared among them.

customerLimitId.description: The identifier of the customer limits application

riskGroupId.description: Identifier of the CUSTOMER.GROUP that constitues one or more related customers which would be used while arrivnig collective risk exposure of credit line liable to them either individually or shared among them.

liabilityNumber.description: Identifier of the Liability Customer to the credit limit

creditLineNumber.description: Details of the top most parent credit line plus the limit product in the hierarchy. Eg : 300/LI1701101987 where 300 is the limit product of the topmost parent and second part is the respective creditline

recordParent.description: Identifier of the immediate parent limit

limitProduct.description: Identifier of the credit limit product

limitProductName.description: Display Short Name of Limit product

serialNumber.description: A sequence reference for the limit, which when used together with other fields such as Liability Number and/or Limit Reference, provides a unique identifier for a credit line

limitCurrency.description: Currency in which the credit limit is granted

businessUnit.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

expiryDate.description: The date an agreement such as an arrangement, product, credit facility or limit is due to expire

timeBandName.description: Description of the individual time code under a credit facility

internalAmount.description: Indicates the amount allocated to the Credit Limit by the Bank

advisedAmount.description: Indicates the amount advised to the Credit Limit by the bank

outstandingAmount.description: Identifies the total outstanding amount for the corresponding Liability number and Limit reference.

availableAmount.description: The credit limit available to the customer for use

availableOrExcess.description: The available amount for the corresponding liability number and limit reference. This amount is always expressed in the currency of the limit. Calculated as the sum of the online limit, the available balance and any sub allocation taken, less any sub allocation given, any commission available, the total outstanding.

totalCommitment.description: Specifies the total available commitment amounts  specific to a credit facility

totalCredit.description: Indicates the total credit balance of the customer's account

totalDebit.description: Indicates the total debit balance of the customer's account

requestedCurrency.description: The currency the amount is requested in.

exchangeRate.description: Contains the exchange rate returned from the system. i.e. For entries over foreign currency accounts, this contains the rate which used to convert the currency amount to the local equivalent at the time of the originating transaction.

limitType.description: Defines the limit type for the trade

jointLiability.description: Identifies if there is a joint liability on the limit record Allowed values: -YES -NO

sharedLimit.description: Indicates whether the credit line is of shared limit structure

adjustAvailableAmount.description: Indicates to adjust the available funds to respective time bands.

rebuildData.description: Indicates to rebuild the customer exposure when enquired by user.

sessionId.description: Id of the T24 session where the risk exposure view executed

originalInternalAmount.description: Specifies the orignal amount actually approved or authorised on a credit line by Management or the Credit Committee before any repayment made

originalAdvisedAmount.description: Specifies the original amount advised to the customer holding the credit facility before any repayment made

repaidAmount.description: Indicates the amount which was repaid from the customer

totalRepaidAmount.description: Total of the repaid amount under a credit facility

excessFlag.description: Flag to indicate the credit line has been over utilised

fixedOrVariable.description: Indicates the secured nature of limit that has been covered by a customer collateral. When 'FIXED' the limit amount sanctioned will not have impact on changing value of collateral whereas when 'VARIABLE' limit amount will change based on the collateral amount changes.

securedAmount.description: The total amount that has been covered by the collateral underlying the credit facility

multiCustomerLimit.description: Specifies if a credit facility shall be used by multiple customers

groupClass.description: Classify the type of group, whether it is a CUSTOMER.GROUP or SUB.GROUP

isAggregationExists.description: Indicates if there exists aggregation of one or many customer exposure under a primary customer

mainGroupId.description: Identifier of the main group under which the sub group has been defined

creditLineProduct.description: Identifier of the limit product of the topmost credit facility in the hierarchy

gvIndicator.description: Indicator which specifies the graphical view of risk exposure report requested

onlineLimit.description: The limit amount under a credit line that is actually available for use

groupAccountOfficer.description: Account officer who is allocated the responsibility of maintaining the customer group

groupCompanyId.description: Identifier of the Company where the customer group resides

groupName.description: The name that is displayed for the group

type.description: The product condition has an activity type associated that drives an action.

deposits.description: Total of the customer's account balance

partyType.description: Indicates the type of customer which is part of the relationship. It may be Customer, Person or Entity.

partyId.description: Allows capturing of customers or person entities to be part of the relationship. If partyType is selected as Customer, then the system will allow only customer Ids to be captured into this field. If partyType is selected as Person or Entity, then system will allow only personEntity Ids to be captured into this field.

partyName.description: Specifies the short name of the customer in CUSTOMER.GROUP

relationDisplayName.description: Specifies the description of the RELATION in CUSTOMER.GROUP

groupRelationDisplayName.description: Specifies the description of the GROUP.RELATION in CUSTOMER.GROUP

relatedPartyType.description: Indicates the related party's customer type. It may be Customer, Person or Entity.

relatedPartyName.description: Name of the Party related to the Customer

owningPercent.description: Used to record the percentage of ownership in the relationship. For example an entity may be partially or wholly owned by another entity. This will only be allowed to be entered if the relation is indicated as a type allowing Ownership

customerGroupId.description: Identifier of the CUSTOMER.GROUP that constitues one or more related customers which would be used while arrivnig collective risk exposure of credit line liable to them either individually or shared among them

limitCurrency.description: Currency in which the credit limit is granted

limitReference.description: Identifies the credit limit reference for the underlying account.

limitAmount.description: The Limit amount that is actually available for use. The system limit checks are preformed against the online limit

outstandingAmount.description: Identifies the total outstanding amount for the corresponding Liability number and Limit reference.

availableOrExcess.description: The available amount for the corresponding liability number and limit reference. This amount is always expressed in the currency of the limit. Calculated as the sum of the online limit, the available balance and any sub allocation taken, less any sub allocation given, any commission available, the total outstanding.

outstandingConditionAccount.description: This  account will be used to drive the overdrawn processing, when there are more than one account attached in limit.

onlineLimit.description: The Limit amount that is actually available for use.The system limit checks are performed against the online limit

availableAmount.description: The credit limit available to the customer for use

limitReference.description: Identifies the credit limit reference for the underlying account.

liabilityNumber.description: Identifier of the Liability Customer to the credit limit

limitCurrency.description: Currency in which the credit limit is granted

internalAmount.description: Indicates the amount allocated to the Credit Limit by the Bank

expiryDate.description: The date an agreement such as an arrangement, product, credit facility or limit is due to expire

serialNumber.description: A sequence reference for the limit, which when used together with other fields such as Liability Number and/or Limit Reference, provides a unique identifier for a credit line

limitCurrency.description: Currency in which the credit limit is granted

limitAmount.description: The Limit amount that is actually available for use. The system limit checks are preformed against the online limit

outstandingAmount.description: Identifies the total outstanding amount for the corresponding Liability number and Limit reference.

availableOrExcess.description: The available amount for the corresponding liability number and limit reference. This amount is always expressed in the currency of the limit. Calculated as the sum of the online limit, the available balance and any sub allocation taken, less any sub allocation given, any commission available, the total outstanding.

expiryDate.description: The date an agreement such as an arrangement, product, credit facility or limit is due to expire

dealReference.description: Identifies the transaction reference of the Deal

dealCurrency.description: Identifies the transaction currency involved in the Deal

dealAmount.description: Identifies the transaction amount involved in the Deal

overdrawnAmount.description: Indicates the current overdrawn amount associated to the account/limit

limitAmount.description: The Limit amount that is actually available for use. The system limit checks are preformed against the online limit

groupCurrency.description: Identifies the currency of the Limit under the Limit sharing group

totalAllocation.description: The total amount allocated for different deals under the limit

commitOverdrawnAmount.description: Excess amount that are made as commitments under the Deal using the Group Limit

commitAmountAlloc.description: Allocated Group limit amount for the commitments under the Deal

masterGroupKeys.description: Automatically updated by system during authorization with the master group key in which the sharing group key is linked. It will be updated only for the Main group and not for the sub groups.

masterGroupKey.description: Automatically updated by system during authorization with the master group key in which the sharing group key is linked. It will be updated only for the Main group and not for the sub groups.

allowedCustomers.description: Customers who are part of Limit sharing Group.

allowedCustomer.description: Customers who are part of Limit sharing Group.

customerPriorities.description: Customer's Limit Sharing Priority to the Group

customerPriority.description: Customer's Limit Sharing Priority to the Group

isSingleCreditLine.description: whether the group sharing limit is single credit line or not

buyCurrency.description: ISO Currency code for the bought currency.

buyAmount.description: Amount bought in the FX deal.

sellCurrency.description: ISO Currency code for the sold currency.

sellAmount.description: Amount sold in the FX deal.

date.description: Indicates the date on which activity was performed

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

limitProduct.description: Identifier of the credit limit product

liabilityNumber.description: Identifier of the Liability Customer to the credit limit

liabilityName.description: Display Name of the Liability Customer

currency.description: Indicates the type of currency to which the account belongs

limitAmount.description: The Limit amount that is actually available for use. The system limit checks are preformed against the online limit

cleanRisk.description: Clean risk or delivery risk, i.e. non-netted total value of forex trades maturing on any single day

date.description: Indicates the date on which activity was performed

limitExcess.description: An indicator to show that a credit limit has been exceeded

riskExcess.description: Excess amount over and above the allowed limit.

allowedCustomers.description: Customers who are part of Limit sharing Group.

allowedCustomer.description: Customers who are part of Limit sharing Group.

allowedProducts.description: Product or products allowed to be used within the product bundle.

allowedProduct.description: Product or products allowed to be used within the product bundle.

groupIdDisplayName.description: Description of the Limit Sharing Group

limitProduct.description: Identifier of the credit limit product

parentGroup.description: Used for sub groups to create a hierarchy with main group. It is not required for Main groups and is mandatory for sub groups.

singleLineSerialNumber.description: Serial number of credit limit of the Single Line limit sharing group

masterGroupKey.description: Automatically updated by system during authorization with the master group key in which the sharing group key is linked. It will be updated only for the Main group and not for the sub groups.

customerPriority.description: Customer's Limit Sharing Priority to the Group

allowedCustomer.description: Customers who are part of Limit sharing Group.

subGroupId.description: Identifier of the Limit Sharing Sub Group

subGroupDisplayName.description: Indicates the title of the Limit Sharing Sub Group

limitProduct.description: Identifier of the credit limit product

serialNumber.description: A sequence reference for the limit, which when used together with other fields such as Liability Number and/or Limit Reference, provides a unique identifier for a credit line

limitCurrency.description: Currency in which the credit limit is granted

limitAmount.description: The Limit amount that is actually available for use. The system limit checks are preformed against the online limit

outstandingAmount.description: Identifies the total outstanding amount for the corresponding Liability number and Limit reference.

availableOrExcess.description: The available amount for the corresponding liability number and limit reference. This amount is always expressed in the currency of the limit. Calculated as the sum of the online limit, the available balance and any sub allocation taken, less any sub allocation given, any commission available, the total outstanding.

expiryDate.description: The date an agreement such as an arrangement, product, credit facility or limit is due to expire

firstOverdrawnDate.description: Indicates the date on which the overdraw/excess first occurred

lastMvmtDate.description: Indicates the date on which last movement occurred in the overdrawn account/limit

previousOutstanding.description: Indicates the amount that was last moved in the overdrawn account/limit

currentOutstanding.description: Indicates the current outstanding amount of the bill

limitExcess.description: An indicator to show that a credit limit has been exceeded

excessNarrative.description: Indicates the action of the last movement occurred in the overdrawn account/Limit

movedNarrative.description: Indicates whether there is any change in the overdrawn status

currentOdStatus.description: Indicates the current overdraft status of the Account

previousOdStatus.description: Indicates the previous overdraft status of the Account

statusChangeOn.description: Indicates the date when the overdraft status is changed

currentOdStartDate.description: Indicates the date when the current Overdraft Status is started

currentOdDays.description: Indicates the number of days account is continuously in Overdraft

overdrawnAmount.description: Indicates the current overdrawn amount associated to the account/limit

thresholdAmount.description: Indicates the threshold amount defined in account/limit beyond which is considered to overdraft/breach

limitReference.description: Identifies the credit limit reference for the underlying account.

liabilityNumber.description: Identifier of the Liability Customer to the credit limit

limitCurrency.description: Currency in which the credit limit is granted

internalAmount.description: Indicates the amount allocated to the Credit Limit by the Bank

advisedAmount.description: Indicates the amount advised to the Credit Limit by the bank

limitReviewDate.description: Specifies the next date on which the limit is reviewed

expiryDate.description: The date an agreement such as an arrangement, product, credit facility or limit is due to expire

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

totalUniqueRow.description: Indicates the unique combinations of Category limit , sub category limit and Tenor

limitProduct.description: Identifier of the credit limit product

productDescription.description: Indicates the description of the Product

limitSubProduct.description: Specifies the sub category limit product

subProductDescription.description: Specifies the product description of the sub category limit

timeCode.description: Specifies time sub-divisions of a Limit, each of which is available for a different maturity period

timeBandName.description: Description of the individual time code under a credit facility

subGroup.description: Identifier of the sub group within a CUSTOMER.GROUP that constitues one or more related customers which would be used while arrivnig collective risk exposure of credit line liable to them either individually or shared among them.

subGroupName.description: Specifies the SUB.GROUP name of the CUSTOMER.GROUP

companyCode.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

partyType.description: Indicates the type of customer which is part of the relationship. It may be Customer, Person or Entity.

riskGroupId.description: Identifier of the CUSTOMER.GROUP that constitues one or more related customers which would be used while arrivnig collective risk exposure of credit line liable to them either individually or shared among them.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

currencyId.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

limitExpiryDate.description: This field specifies the validity of the Limit, i.e. how long is it to remain in force

internalAmount.description: Indicates the amount allocated to the Credit Limit by the Bank

availableAmount.description: The credit limit available to the customer for use

riskCriterionName.description: Indicates the risk criterion name based on which the risk elements of a contract is framed.

riskCriterionValue.description: Indicates the risk criterion value for a risk criterion name

limitNumber.description: A sequence reference for the limit, which when used together with other fields such as Liability Number and/or Limit Reference, provides a unique identifier for a credit line

limitCurrency.description: Currency in which the credit limit is granted

onlineLimit.description: The Limit amount that is actually available for use.The system limit checks are performed against the online limit

fixedOrVariable.description: Indicates the secured nature of limit that has been covered by a customer collateral. When FIXED the limit amount sanctioned will not have impact on changing value of collateral whereas when VARIABLE limit amount will change based on the collateral amount changes

securedAmount.description: The total amount that has been covered by the collateral underlying the credit facility

outstandingAmount.description: Identifies the total outstanding amount for the corresponding Liability number and Limit reference.

availableOrExcess.description: The available amount for the corresponding liability number and limit reference. This amount is always expressed in the currency of the limit. Calculated as the sum of the online limit, the available balance and any sub allocation taken, less any sub allocation given, any commission available, the total outstanding.
